name: Games Galore 1
overview: A collection of four Computer Concepts games. Fruit Worm by Paul Hiscock is a Snake type game. Fruity Tooty is a fruit machine simulator. Invasion Alert by M R Bateman (POM Software) is a Space Invaders clone. It's listed as Space Invaders on the game box and as Invasion Alert in-game. Loony Lander by O Wurstlin (POM Software) is a Moon Lander type game.
